content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace that was retrieved and used to smelt iron ore into iron plates. This structure supports the production of intermediate resources needed for lab crafting.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(-27.0, -60.0)
Consists of a furnace utilized for processing copper ore into copper plates. It underpins the conversion needed for producing copper cables and other sub-ingredients required for lab crafting.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Call Usage
  - Use the correct signature for get_entities. Avoid unsupported keyword arguments (e.g. ‘radius’) and supplying positional parameters when none are expected.

• Lab Placement
  - Confirm that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement. Verify that the target location is unoccupied to ensure successful placement.

• Lab Crafting Dependencies
  - Ensure that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available or producible. Address the cascading crafting dependencies before initiating Lab production.

• Handling None Values
  - Check that functions returning collections (like get_entities) do not return None before iterating over them; use an empty list as a fallback if necessary.
